Class DatabaseManager

    • Method Detail

      • addProduct

        public static int addProduct(java.lang.String prodName,
                             java.lang.String manuName,
                             ItemType itemType)
        Method to add a new Product to the database.
        Parameters:
        prodName - Name of the new Product.
        manuName - Name of the manufacturer of the new Product.
        itemType - Item type of the new Product.
        Returns:
        The ID of the new Product in the database.

      • loadProducts

        public static java.util.List<Product> loadProducts()
        Method to load all existing products from the database.
        Returns:
        ResultSet containing all products in the database.

      • saveProductionRecord

        public static void saveProductionRecord(ProductionRecord prodRec)
        Method to save a ProductionRecord to the database.
        Parameters:
        prodRec - ProductionRecord object that you want to be saved to the database.

      • loadProductionRecords

        public static java.util.List<ProductionRecord> loadProductionRecords()
        Method to load all existing production records from the database.
        Returns:
        ResultSet containing all production records in the database.

      • insert

        private static int insert(java.lang.String query,
                          java.lang.Object... params)
        General method to insert data into the database. For internal use only.
        Parameters:
        query - Query String to execute.
        params - Any values that should be inserted into the PreparedStatement upon creation.
        Returns:
        ResultSet containing the generated keys.

      • getConnection

        private static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
        General method to create a new connection to the database.
        Returns:
        The newly created connection.

      • reverseString

        private static java.lang.String reverseString(java.lang.String pw)
        This method reverses whatever string is passed to it.
        Parameters:
        pw - The string to reverse.
        Returns:
        The reversed string.

      • closeConnection

        private static void closeConnection(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                    java.sql.PreparedStatement preparedStatement,
                                    java.sql.Statement statement,
                                    java.sql.ResultSet resultSet)
        Method that ensures all database connections are closed when no longer needed.
        Parameters:
        connection - The Connection to close.
        preparedStatement - The PreparedStatement to close.
        statement - The Statement to close.
        resultSet - The ResultSet to close.
